Description: This wonderful unit private entrance and in one of the best streets in eighth streets neighborhood in the South End and faces Ringgold park. great kitchen open to living room area ,small dining area or office space off entrance area of living room, hardwood floors thru out king size bedroom and private patio makes this a must see!Tenant must have good credit, references and employment, tenant must also have renters insurance and list landlord as co insured on policy.
